trans-unit.source: Defines values that specify the hardware capabilities of a tablet device, including desktop digitizers and mice.
trans-unit.target: 定義值，這些值指定 Tablet 裝置 (包括桌面數位板和滑鼠) 的硬體能力。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration has a <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉型別的 <xref:System.FlagsAttribute> 屬性允許成員值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine the hardware capabilities of a tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何判斷平板電腦裝置的硬體功能。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the tablet device can generate in-air packets when the stylus is in the physical detection range (proximity) of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: 表示當手寫筆位於 Tablet 裝置的實體偵測範圍之內 (附近) 時，Tablet 裝置可以產生空中封包。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the digitizer is integrated with the display.
trans-unit.target: 表示數位板與顯示器整合在一起。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the tablet device cannot provide this information.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Tablet 裝置無法提供此資訊。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the tablet device can uniquely identify the active stylus.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Tablet 裝置可唯一識別使用中的手寫筆。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the stylus must be in physical contact with the tablet device to report its position.
trans-unit.target: 表示手寫筆必須與 Tablet 裝置實體接觸才能報告其位置。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the tablet device can detect the amount of pressure the user applies when using the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Tablet 裝置可以偵測到使用者在使用手寫筆時套用的壓力總量。
